mfs_file_block Struct Reference

#include <xilmfs.h>

Detailed Description

mfs_file_block is the basic unit of the file system each block has a type identifier to identify the block as being part of a file a directory or empty each block has pointers to the next and prev blocks if any, in the file/dir/free-list

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
